member.name: IPersistFolder2.GetCurFolder
member.summary: Gets the for the folder object.
member.param: The address of an pointer. This PIDL represents the absolute location of the folder and must be relative to the desktop. This is typically a copy of the PIDL passed to .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPersistFolder2
member.summary: Exposes methods that obtain information from Shell folder objects.
